titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Adoption Day and National Adoption Month by promoting national awareness of adoption and the children in foster care awaiting families, celebrating children and families involved in adoption, recognizing current programs and efforts designed to promote adoption, and encouraging people in the United States to seek improved safety, permanency, and well-being for all children.

bill.summary:
Supports the goals and ideals of National Adoption Day and National Adoption Month.
Recognizes that every child in foster care deserves a permanent and loving family and the significant commitment of taxpayers to support adoption.
